segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused she is on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite mischievous, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious just looking at him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water before it causes a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I would definitely say something if I saw this happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
